abstract: In his role as chief executive of the nonprofit Sesame Workshop, Gary E. Knell oversaw the production of “Sesame Street” and other children’s media.
snippet: In his role as chief executive of the nonprofit Sesame Workshop, Gary E. Knell oversaw the production of “Sesame Street” and other children’s media.
lead_paragraph: 8:49 p.m. | Updated Gary E. Knell, who has led the nonprofit Sesame Workshop for the last 11 years, will become chief executive of NPR in December, the public radio network announced on Sunday.

headline.main: NPR Names ‘Sesame Street’ Executive as Its Leader
